description: Describes a trait that MAY be applied to a Message Object.

additionalProperties.description: MUST be a valid JSON object serialized as a string, e.g. "{\"key\": \"value\"}". Do NOT output plain text — the value must parse with JSON.parse().

^x-[\\w\\d\\.\\x2d_]+$.description: Any property starting with x- is valid.

The content type to use when encoding/decoding a message's payload.

$ref.description: A simple object to allow referencing other components in the specification, internally and externally. Constraints: format: uri-reference.

anyOf.description: An object that specifies an identifier at design time that can used for message tracing and correlation.

additionalProperties.description: MUST be a valid JSON object serialized as a string, e.g. "{\"key\": \"value\"}". Do NOT output plain text — the value must parse with JSON.parse().

^x-[\\w\\d\\.\\x2d_]+$.description: Any property starting with x- is valid.

anyOf.description: A optional description of the correlation ID. GitHub Flavored Markdown is allowed.

location.description: A runtime expression that specifies the location of the correlation ID

anyOf.description: Definition of the correlation ID used for message tracing or matching.
A longer description of the message. CommonMark is allowed.
Allows referencing an external resource for extended documentation.

additionalProperties.description: MUST be a valid JSON object serialized as a string, e.g. "{\"key\": \"value\"}". Do NOT output plain text — the value must parse with JSON.parse().

^x-[\\w\\d\\.\\x2d_]+$.description: Any property starting with x- is valid.

anyOf.description: A short description of the target documentation.

url.description: The URL for the target documentation. This MUST be in the form of an absolute URL. Constraints: format: uri.

anyOf.description: Schema definition of the application headers.
Unique string used to identify the message. The id MUST be unique among all messages described in the API.
Name of the message.
A string containing the name of the schema format/language used to define the message payload.
A brief summary of the message.
A list of tags for logical grouping and categorization of messages. Constraints: items must be unique.

items.description: Allows adding meta data to a single tag.

additionalProperties.description: MUST be a valid JSON object serialized as a string, e.g. "{\"key\": \"value\"}". Do NOT output plain text — the value must parse with JSON.parse().

^x-[\\w\\d\\.\\x2d_]+$.description: Any property starting with x- is valid.

anyOf.description: A short description for the tag.
Additional external documentation for this tag.

additionalProperties.description: MUST be a valid JSON object serialized as a string, e.g. "{\"key\": \"value\"}". Do NOT output plain text — the value must parse with JSON.parse().

^x-[\\w\\d\\.\\x2d_]+$.description: Any property starting with x- is valid.

anyOf.description: A short description of the target documentation.

url.description: The URL for the target documentation. This MUST be in the form of an absolute URL. Constraints: format: uri.

anyOf.description: A human-friendly title for the message.
